statements: DELETE FROM genomic_data WHERE species_name = 'Homo sapiens';
DELETE FROM genomic_data WHERE id = 5 AND species_name = 'Homo sapiens';
DELETE FROM genomic_data WHERE gene_name = 'BRCA1' AND chromosome = '13' AND start_position < 1000;
DELETE FROM genomic_data WHERE species_name = 'Mus musculus' AND (chromosome = 'X' OR chromosome = 'Y') AND end_position > 50000;
DELETE FROM ComparativeGenomics WHERE EvolutionaryDistance > 0.5 AND NumSharedGenes < 500;
DELETE FROM genes WHERE gene_id IN (SELECT gene_id FROM mutations WHERE mutation_type = 'insertion');
DELETE FROM species WHERE species_id NOT IN (SELECT gene_id FROM genes);
DELETE FROM Alignments WHERE alignment_score < 0.5 AND alignment_id IN (SELECT alignment_id FROM Alignments WHERE gene_id IN (SELECT gene_id FROM Genes WHERE species_id = 1));

DELETE FROM Genes WHERE species_id = 2 AND gene_id NOT IN (SELECT gene_id FROM Alignments) AND gene_id IN (SELECT gene_id FROM Genes WHERE chromosome_id IN (SELECT chromosome_id FROM Chromosomes WHERE species_id = 2));
DELETE FROM Chromosomes WHERE species_id = 3 AND chromosome_id NOT IN (SELECT chromosome_id FROM Genes);
DELETE FROM Genes WHERE chromosome = 'X' AND species_id = 1;
DELETE FROM Mutations WHERE mutation_type = 'insertion' AND mutation_position < 100;
